analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0xab7e4ae99d7bfff4de8322ab915e9066857227f0.sol:
	Contract Europium has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0xab7e4ae99d7bfff4de8322ab915e9066857227f0.sol#208)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xab7e4ae99d7bfff4de8322ab915e9066857227f0.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0xab7e4ae99d7bfff4de8322ab915e9066857227f0.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0xab7e4ae99d7bfff4de8322ab915e9066857227f0.sol#78) is not in mixedCase
